scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.serve: nodemon --debug=$((${PORT:=2000}-1)) src/server.js --ignore src/route.js --ignore src/component --ignore src/page --ignore src/client.js --ignore src/reducer.js --ignore src/actor.js --ignore src/saga.js --exec babel-node
scripts.docker:build: docker-compose -f docker-compose.build.yml stop frontend-ziltag.com && docker-compose -f docker-compose.build.yml rm -v -f frontend-ziltag.com && docker-compose -f docker-compose.build.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.build.yml build
scripts.docker:upgrade: npm run docker:pull && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:migrate
scripts.docker:initdb: CONTAINER_NAME=frontend-ziltag.com_initdb PORT=${PORT:=2000} SSL_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}+1)) DEBUG_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}-1)) docker-compose run --rm ziltag.dev bin/rake dev:setup
scripts.docker:migrate: CONTAINER_NAME=frontend-ziltag.com_migrate PORT=${PORT:=2000} SSL_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}+1)) DEBUG_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}-1)) docker-compose run --rm ziltag.dev bin/rake db:migrate
scripts.docker:serve: npm run docker:stop && CONTAINER_NAME=frontend-ziltag.com_serve PORT=${PORT:=2000} SSL_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}+1)) DEBUG_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}-1)) docker-compose up
scripts.docker:stop: CONTAINER_NAME=frontend-ziltag.com_serve PORT=${PORT:=2000} SSL_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}+1)) DEBUG_PORT=$((${PORT:=2000}-1)) docker-compose stop $CONTAINER_NAME
